member.name: IP_DAD_STATE
member.summary: The IP_DAD_STATE enumeration specifies information about the duplicate address detection (DAD) state for an IPv4 or IPv6 address.

member.name: IP_DAD_STATE.IpDadStateDuplicate
member.summary: A duplicate IP address has been detected.

member.name: IP_DAD_STATE.IpDadStateDeprecated
member.summary: The IP address has been deprecated.

member.name: IP_DAD_STATE.IpDadStatePreferred
member.summary: The IP address is the preferred address.
